attributes.action: For an enquiry into why the Balen Report has not been released
attributes.additional_details:
In 2004 the BBC commissioned the Balen Report, investigating alleged institutional bias in its reporting of the Israeli - Palestinian conflict.

The report has never been released. In response to a Freedom of Information request, the BBC has admitted spending £332,780.47 of public money in legal costs alone to hide the contents of the report from the public.

We ask the Minister to commission a public enquiry into why this money has been spent in this way, and why the report has not been released.

rejection.details: This is purely a matter for the BBC/BBC Trust.
